chunked_vad.lyrics_text: You know I'd fall apart without you Don't know how you do what you do Everythin' that don't make sense about me Makes sense when I'm with you

But it's more than one and one makes two Put aside the math and the logic of it You gotta know you're wanted too 'Cause I wanna wrap you up

'Cause I wanna wrap you up Wanna kiss your lips I wanna make you feel wanted I wanna call you mine
Wanna kiss your lips I wanna make you feel wanted I wanna call you mine Wanna hold your hand forever

Wanna make you feel Wanna make you feel Wanted Anyone can tell you, you're pretty babe, yeah

I know you get that all the time, I know you do Your beauty's deeper than the make-up I wanna show you what I see tonight When I wrap you up
